types.section:
{{fr-noun|m|jours-amendes}}

# {{lb|fr|French law}} One of the [[day]]s specified in a [[financial]] [[penalty]] whereby a certain amount of money (measured in units per day) must be paid by a fixed date, any unpaid days resulting in days in [[prison]]
types.html:
jour-amende m (plural jours-amendes)

  1. (French law) One of the days specified in a financial penalty whereby a certain amount of money (measured in units per day) must be paid by a fixed date, any unpaid days resulting in days in prison
trans: One of the days specified in a financial penalty whereby a certain amount of money  must be paid by a fixed date, any unpaid days resulting in days in prison
One of the days specified in a financial penalty whereby a certain amount of money  must be paid by a fixed date, any unpaid days resulting in days in prison
